tools.name: Get-InactiveLicensedUsers
tools.description: Identifies licensed users who have not signed in within the specified threshold.

IncludeDisabled.description:
Include disabled user accounts in the analysis. Default: included automatically
as DISABLED WITH LICENSE findings.

IncludeGuests.description: Include guest (external) users in the analysis.

DaysInactive.description: Number of days without sign-in to consider a user inactive. Default: 90.

tools.name: Get-LicenseInventory
tools.description: Retrieves the full Microsoft 365 license inventory for the tenant.

tools.name: Get-LicenseSavingsReport
tools.description: Aggregates all license optimization findings into a savings summary.

DaysInactive.description: Number of days without sign-in to consider a user inactive. Default: 90.

tools.name: Get-UnderutilizedLicenses
tools.description: Identifies users with expensive licenses who are not using premium features.

DaysInactive.description: Number of days without sign-in to flag as inactive. Default: 90.

tools.name: Invoke-LicenseOptimization
tools.description: Orchestrates a full Microsoft 365 license optimization analysis.

IncludeGuests.description: Include guest (external) users in the inactive user analysis.

OutputPath.description: Directory where the HTML report will be saved. Defaults to current directory.

DaysInactive.description: Number of days without sign-in to flag as inactive. Default: 90.
